name: New Event
_source: speak;Emily; Sis, look, a boar!{w} You got your bow ready?
speak;Emma; I'm scared, Emily{tgm}...{w} The boar looks dangerous!{w} I got magic, so why can't I just set it on fire?
speak;Emily; Emma, your magic goes out of control when you get scared, remember?{w} So learning how to hunt without magic is the best thing for you.
speak;Emma; But that lady in our village was teaching me how to control it!{w} I think I can do it!
speak;Emily; You mean that lady that just took out the boar for us?
